tool_description: Algunas recetas para tu sitio y en español
title: Recetas en español

api_list.name: Get recipes details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recetas-en-espanol.p.rapidapi.com/api/recipes/details/{slug}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recetas-en-espanol.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get recipes

import requests
